price: Dan makanlah makanan yang halal lagi baik dari apa yang Allah telah rezkikan kepadamu, dan bertakwalah kepada Allah yang kamu beriman kepada-Nya.
arabic: وَكُلُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗاۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنتُم بِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakulū mimmā razaqakumu al-lahu ḥalālan ṭayyiban wa-ittaqū al-laha alladhī antum bihi mu'minūna
